meanings.sent1: The etoile shone brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: She drew an etoile on her art project.
meanings.sent3: The etoile on top of the Christmas tree twinkled merrily.
meanings.sent4: Her radiant smile lit up the room like an etoile.
meanings.sent5: The etoile guided the lost travelers through the darkness.

meanings.definition: A ballet position in which the dancer stands on one leg with the other leg raised and turned outwards, with the arms extended in a curved position.
meanings.sent1: The ballerina gracefully performed the etoile on stage.
meanings.sent2: During the ballet recital, she executed a perfect etoile.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to mimic the etoile pose with its tail in the air.
meanings.sent4: Her balance was as steady as an etoile in the dancer's hand.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's elegant etoile captivated the audience's attention.
